title: Starter Pack
description: 5 essential protein brownie recipes to get you started. Perfect for beginners!

title: Fudgy Favorites Pack
description: A collection of our five most fudgy and decadent protein brownie recipes.

title: Blondie Collection
description: A delightful assortment of five protein-packed blondie recipes.

title: Secretly Healthy Pack
description: Five delicious protein brownie recipes made with hidden veggies like black beans, sweet potato, avocado, zucchini, and pumpkin.

title: Chocolate Lovers Pack
description: An intense chocolate experience with five of our most chocolatey protein brownie recipes.

title: No-Bake Bars Pack
description: Five quick and easy no-bake protein bar recipes for when you need a healthy treat in a hurry.

title: Single Serving Pack
description: Five single-serving protein brownie recipes that you can make in the microwave in minutes.

title: Gluten-Free & Dairy-Free
description: A collection of our best gluten-free and dairy-free recipes, perfect for those with dietary restrictions.
